Section.Catchline: State Long-Term Care Ombudsman Program complaint procedures.

SectionBody.Text: The department shall adopt rules implementing state and local complaint procedures. The rules must include procedures for:

Subsection.Text: Receiving complaints against a long-term care facility or an employee of a long-term care facility.
Conducting investigations of a long-term care facility or an employee of a long-term care facility subsequent to receiving a complaint.
Conducting onsite administrative assessments of long-term care facilities.
